001package org.opt4j.optimizers.ea.aeseh;
002
003import java.util.Set;
004
005import org.opt4j.core.Individual;
006
007/**
008 * The {@link NeighborhoodScheduler} manages the schedule according to which the
009 * neighborhoods are chosen by the {@link EpsilonNeighborhoodCoupler} to pick the crossover
010 * parents.
011 * 
012 * @author Fedor Smirnov
013 *
014 */
015public interface NeighborhoodScheduler {
016
017        /**
018         * Returns a copy of the neighborhood that shall be used for the creation of
019         * the next pair of parents.
020         * 
021         * @return copy of the neighborhood set
022         */
023        public Set<Individual> next();
024
025}
